channel.title: [Delta]Real Teleports with levels
channel.description: Source:DeltaCleaned How can I make it so that when you click the varrock teleport you need the correct level and runes? I have tried multiple times before coming here and I just can't figure this out >.< Thanks in advance! rep++ If I can.

u have to add something like this

and check if playerHasItem

and deleteItem

and add a sM if to low level with } else

its same as other spells like barrage or something u just need to add something…

then u said:

where do i add it tho

…

if u dont now which files contains teleport name/coords i think ur an idiot if u worked on a rsps for over a year u should know that[/quote]
I know where all of that stuff is located but I don’t know where to add this too…
Would it be like this:

		case 4140:
                        if (playerLevel[6] >= levelRequired) {
                        if (playerHasItem(rune1, rune1amount)
                                        && playerHasItem(rune2, rune2amount)
                                        && playerHasItem(rune3, rune3amount)) {
			c.triggerTele(3214 + Misc.random(3), 3424 + Misc.random(3), 0);
                                deleteItem(rune1, rune1amount);
                                deleteItem(rune2, rune2amount);
                                deleteItem(rune3, rune3amount);
                                addSkillXP(exp, 6);
                        } else {
                                sM("You do not have the required amount of runes to preform this teleport.");
                        }
                } else {
                        sM("You do not have the required magic level to preform this teleport.");
                }

item.title: [Delta]Real Teleports with levels
item.dc:creator: @kingdomkey01 kingdomkey01
item.description:
@kingdomkey01 wrote:

        public void teleport(int X, int Y, int heightLevel, int rune1, int rune1amount, int rune2,
                        int rune2amount, int rune3, int rune3amount, int levelRequired,
                        int exp) {
                if (playerLevel[6] >= levelRequired) {
                        if (playerHasItem(rune1, rune1amount)
                                        && playerHasItem(rune2, rune2amount)
                                        && playerHasItem(rune3, rune3amount)) {
                                triggerTele(X + misc.random(1), Y + misc.random(1), heightLevel);
                                deleteItem(rune1, rune1amount);
                                deleteItem(rune2, rune2amount);
                                deleteItem(rune3, rune3amount);
                                addSkillXP(exp, 6);
                        } else {
                                sM("You do not have the required amount of runes to preform this teleport.");
                        }
                } else {
                        sM("You do not have the required magic level to preform this teleport.");
                }
        }

If I have to tell you how to use that method, then you don’t deserve it. I’ve already given you enough… this is practically spoonfeeding.

Read full topic
